comments: Dr. Jackson was a very good teacher. she taught me more things than music, she taught me about life. She was a very good mentor and life teacher.

Dr. Jackson is an amazing teacher. I am currently in intro to music therapy and she made me love it. She is engaging and makes the class interactive and fun. I have already recommended this class and her to everyone I know!

Dr. Jackson is an amazing teacher. I am currently in intro to music therapy and she made me love it. She is engaging and makes the class interactive and fun. I have already recommended this class and her to everyone I know! soul enortav

Extremely nice lady. There are assignments due throughout the semester, but not difficult at all. There is no book required for this class. It is a fun class, but occasionally she lectures all class and it can be boring, however, i would recommend to anyone:)
Not sure of the class number for Music Therapy, teacher is great, easy to understand, very understanding, and nice. Class is more interesting than not. Easy class.

She is a wonderful professor! Dr. Jackson pushed our class out of our comfort zone, resulting in our class having lots of fun! She\'s also willing to explain questions. It\'s an easy class-very easy A. I have a 115% in her class.

I cannot imagine how anyone could not like Prof. Jackson. I am in intro to music therapy right now and I love it. Had no interest in it from the beginning, but she makes it extremely fun. She is always there to help and doesn\'t take herself seriously. BEST PROF EVER. TAKE HER CLASS.

Took Intro to Music Therapy with her and wish I hadn\'t. She was extremely patronizing. Taught us nothing about MT. Assigned us a 4-page paper on the American Disabilities Act, then assigned us the same paper with a 12-page minimum the next week. Horrible, frustrating, annoying. STAY AWAY!
